title: Is it okay if I post fanmade lore and post it on Reddit?
body: I'm looking into starting writing fanmade lore for League, just want to make sure I am allowed

replies.body:
Yes!   And actually we (riot) want you too.  While it's unlikely (though not impossible!) your lore would become official, we (as rioters and as fellow players) want to see how people interpret the characters. We all want more opportunities to dive into Runeterra and feel that world.  

Make it.

Go for it.  

And swim well.

{{champion:420}}

Well...that's motivating. 

Now to edit my Pantheon fic.

Edit: Done, http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/9qgEGYkY-skyfall-pantheon-fanfic
I'd post it over in concepts and creations.
PLEASE DO ONE ON SION if you do you get my upvote :D or at least include noxus!

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/MygVPEZ3-the-vow-of-sion-story

Here's a Sion fic I wrote a while ago.  Seemed pretty popular so I bet you might like it.

http://www.riotgames.com/legal-jibber-jabber

Basically, it's fine as long as it's free for everyone to see.

Never seen anything get taken down for it. since its just fanmade it isnt like you are leaking information, its all how you interpret the universe yourself. Il read it {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
